channel.title: CONCERT BLAST!
channel.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
channel.description: WELCOME TO CONCERT BLAST! A Weekly Podcast of 4 hosts (Mike Arnold, Brian Hasbrook, Tom Thompson, and James Downing) based in Nashville, TN with Concert Reviews, Various Interviews, Music Discussions, and a whole lot of fun!... JOIN US!
channel.itunes:summary: WELCOME TO CONCERT BLAST! A Weekly Podcast of 4 hosts (Mike Arnold, Brian Hasbrook, Tom Thompson, and James Downing) based in Nashville, TN with Concert Reviews, Interviews, Music Discussions, and a whole lot of fun!... JOIN US!

item.title: Show 228 - George Thorogood and the Destroyers Concert Review
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Mike Arnold, Tom Thompson and old Concert Blast friend Michael Fulghum reviewed the George Thorogood and the Destroyers concert at the SOLD-OUT Wildhorse Saloon in Nashville, TN from Tuesday March 20th. Enjoy the podcast with the live clips.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 227 - Rick Springfield Concert Review
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Mike Arnold, Tom Thompson and James Downing of Concert Blast, along with several Rick Springfield fans reviewed the annual Rick Springfield concert at the SOLD-OUT Wildhorse Saloon in Nashville, TN from Friday Feb. 10th. Enjoy the podcast with lots of live clips.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 226 - Valentine's Day Concert Blast Special
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Mike Arnold, Brian Hasbrook, and Tom Thompson of Concert Blast enjoy discussing Classic Rock Love Songs for this special podcast dedicated to Valentine's Day. Lots of humor in this one!
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 225 - The Crowd (Nashville's Party Rock Band) 30 Year Reunion Celebration Concert Review - Nashville, TN
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Mike Arnold and Tom Thompson of Concert Blast reviewed their own concert as their former band from the 80s, The Crowd (Nashville's Party Rock Band) performed a 30 Year Reunion Celebration at the packed Douglas Corner Cafe in Nashville, TN. Enjoy the podcast with live clips.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 224 - Queensryche Concert Review - Nashville, TN
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Mike Arnold, James Downing, and Tom Thompson of Concert Blast attented and reviewed the Queensryche Concert at the packed Wildhorse Saloon in Nashville, TN. Enjoy the podcast with live clips.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 223 - B-52s Concert Review - Nashville, TN
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST

item.title: Show 222 - Big and Rich Concert Review with Gretchen Wilson and Cowboy Troy – Nashville, TN
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Mike Arnold and Brian Hasbrook of Concert Blast attented and reviewed the Big and Rich Concert Party with Gretchen Wilson and Cowboy Troy at the packed Woods at Fontanel amphitheatre in Nashville, TN. Enjoy the podcast co-hosted by Mike and Brian with lots of live clips and surprises.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 221 - Billy Burnette Interview – Nashville, TN
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: James Downing of Concert Blast interviewed Billy Burnette before his show at 3rd and Lindsley in Nashville, TN. Enjoy James' interview as he discusses Billy's musical history.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 220 - The McClymonts Interview – Nashville, TN
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST

item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 219 - Billy Joe Shaver Concert Review – Nashville, TN – Exit In – 8/20/2011
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Concert Blast covered the Billy Joe Shaver concert in Nashville, TN. Enjoy Mike's review as he describes the set list from Billy Joe Shaver with plenty of live clips.

item.title: Show 218 - Styx Concert Review with Yes – Nashville, TN – LP Field – 7/16/2011

item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 217 - CMA Music Fest 2011 Stadium Concerts Coverage Part 4 of 4 – Nashville, TN – LP Field – 6/12/2011
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Our CMA Music Fest 2011 Coverage continued with the fourth and final night of the festival, the Sunday Night Stadium Concerts, thrilled packed stadium of country music fans with major headliners and a couple of surprises! On the bill that night was Taylor Swift, Miranda Lambert, Blake Shelton, Darius Rucker, The Band Perry, and opening the show was the JaneDear girls.
item.author: concertblast@gmail.com (CONCERT BLAST)

item.title: Show 216 - CMA Music Fest 2011 Stadium Concerts Coverage Part 3 of 4 – Nashville, TN – LP Field – 6/11/2011
item.itunes:author: CONCERT BLAST
item.description: Our CMA Music Fest 2011 Coverage continued with the third night of the festival, the Saturday Night Stadium Concerts, thrilled 50,000 plus country music fans with major headliners and loads of surprises! On the bill that night was Rascal Flatts, Martina McBride, Trace Adkins, Josh Turner, Little Big Town, and opening the show was Chris Young.
